game.name: WTF AM I PLAYING?!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 왜 이걸 플레이하지? 책을 읽거나, 달리거나, 벽을 바라볼 수도 있어. 하지만 플레이한다면, 빠르고 예측 불가능한 레트로 FPS 액션을 기대해.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Why play this? You could read, run, or stare at a wall. But if you do, expect fast and unpredictable retro FPS action.

reviewHighlights.text: You can watch my gameplay here: https://youtu.be/N9WQwwia8lA If you are searching for a game that is funny and chaotic, this one is for you! Easy to p...
THIS GAME IS AMAZING, i completed it 100% with all the achievements, quite fun, especially the last level, for a moment I thought I was playing doom....
